name: powerapps-bulk-useraccess
title: Add/Remove users(bulk) from Power Apps from CSV file
shortDescription: Script which will help to provide bulk access to Power Apps from csv format
longDescription: This powershell script will Add/Remove/Modify multiple(bulk) users access to/from one or multiple PowerApps from CSV file....

references.name: Want to learn more about Power Apps PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the Power Apps PowerShell documentation site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
